00053   // class CDomain
00126   template <typename T>
00127   struct CDomain
00128   {
00129     // ----------------------- Concept checks ------------------------------
00130   public:
00131     typedef typename T::Domain Domain;
00132     typedef typename T::Space Space;
00133     typedef typename T::Point Point;
00134     typedef typename T::Vector Vector;
00135                 typedef typename T::Integer Integer;
00136     typedef typename T::Size Size;
00137     typedef typename T::Dimension Dimension;
00138     typedef typename T::ConstIterator ConstIterator;
00139     typedef typename T::Predicate Predicate;
00140 
00141     BOOST_CONCEPT_USAGE( CDomain )
00142     {
00143       // Domain should have a lowerBound() returning a Point.
00144       ConceptUtils::sameType( myP, myT.lowerBound() );
00145       // Domain should have an upperBound() returning a Point.
00146       ConceptUtils::sameType( myP, myT.upperBound() );
00147       // Domain should have a isInside(p) returning a bool.
00148       ConceptUtils::sameType( myBool, myT.isInside( myP ) );
00149       // Domain should have a predicate() returning a Predicate.
00150       ConceptUtils::sameType( myPred, myT.predicate() );
00151       // Domain should have a begin() returning an iterator.
00152       ConceptUtils::sameType( myIt, myT.begin() );
00153       // Domain should have a end() returning an iterator.
00154       ConceptUtils::sameType( myIt, myT.end() );
00155     }
00156 
00157     // ------------------------- Private Datas --------------------------------
00158   private:
00159     T myT;
00160     Point myP;
00161     Predicate myPred;
00162     bool myBool;
00163     ConstIterator myIt;
00164 
00165     // ------------------------- Internals ------------------------------------
00166   private:
00167     
00168   }; // end of concept CDomain
